title: id these font handwrite type from a store please!!!!
content:
Hi everybody, I'm working on my personal portfolio and I really need some help to figure out these font!

Thanks in advance.

comments.content:
Thanks very much Renko.

Pedro Henrique

Kestrel Connected is supposedly the original font.

Anyone have any information?

Mike :-)

Someone stated that 'Kestrel' is only available in the 'Omega Composer' software, which is used for designing signs.

[http://board.flashkit.com/board/archive/index.php/t-459502.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20111208020556/http:/board.flashkit.com/board/archive/index.php/t-459502.html "http://board.flashkit.com/board/archive/index.php/t-459502.html")
